inclusion.criterion: documented advanced, locally recurrent, or metastatic head and neck carcinoma
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: papillary thyroid cancer dx w/ right neck mass

inclusion.criterion: prior chemotherapy for advanced/metastatic disease is allowed (1 regimen only)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients must be taxane-naïve (no prior docetaxel or paclitaxel)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: chemoradiation as a primary therapy for advanced head and neck cancer are eligible
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: performance status of 0-2 by Zubrod criteria
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: life expectancy of at least 12 weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: hematologic: absolute neutrophil count (ANC) equal to or > 1,500/mm3
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: total bilirubin must be within normal institutional limits (WNL)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: transaminases (AST/SGOT and ALT/SGPT) may be up to 2.5 X the institutional upper limit of normal (ULN)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: pregnant or lactating women, women of childbearing potential with either a positive pregnancy test (PPT) at baseline
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: use of standard chemotherapy or investigational agents for treatment of head and neck cancer within 28 days of 1st dose of study drug
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer, but is pregnant/lactating.
